official.headline: Technocrat's Passing
official.anchor_line: Marek Halden, architect of our system, has passed away at his residence.
official.contextual_reframing: A system he engineered ensures continuity and stability in our thriving society.

underground.headline: BCI Architect Dead
underground.anchor_line: Marek Halden found dead; powerful grip on BCI now in question.
underground.contextual_reframing: Halden's secretive control over surveillance tech ends, raising urgent questions about who's really in charge now.
